alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 6:55PM CST until March 12 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo. .Runoff from recent heavy rain has caused minor flooding on the lower Ohio River from Olmsted Lock and Dam to Cairo. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 42.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 43.0 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
